perks.name: Conviction
perks.desc: When your Armour is fully depleted, you take 25% less Health Damage for 10 seconds

perks.name: Intimidating Aura
perks.desc: A perfectly timed Parry deals area-of-effect Damage that scales with difficulty within a 5-metre radius.

perks.name: Forward Momentum
perks.desc: After a Shield Bash or Thunder Hammer Pommel Smash, Melee Damage increases by 30% for 10 seconds

perks.name: Armour of Contempt
perks.desc: When you Block a Ranged Attack, enemies within a 10-metre radius take the Damage instead

perks.name: Shock and Awe
perks.desc: Enemies in a Shock area take 25% more Damage

perks.name: Scrambled Targeting
perks.desc: If you are surrounded by 5 or more enemies, you take 25% less Damage from Ranged Attacks

perks.name: Defensive Advantage
perks.desc: A perfectly timed Parry or Block creates a Shock area for 5 seconds. Cooldown is 30 seconds.

perks.name: Steel Within
perks.desc: When your Health is less than 50%, you take 30% less Health Damage

perks.name: Armour Reinforcement
perks.desc: Non-Finisher Gun Strikes restore 1 Armour Segment

perks.name: Focused Restoration
perks.desc: Every 30 seconds, all Squad Members automatically restore 1 Armour Segment

perks.name: Advanced Conditioning
perks.desc: Contested Health fades 50% more slowly for all Squad Members

perks.name: Effective Formation
perks.desc: All Squad members take 20% less Health Damage from Extremis- and Terminus-level enemies

perks.name: Purity of Purpose
perks.desc: The banner deals Damage that scales with difficulty over time to enemies within its area of effect

perks.name: Rapid Regeneration
perks.desc: The banner restores Armour 300% faster, but its Duration is reduced to 10 seconds

perks.name: Focused Strength
perks.desc: Shield Bash knocks enemies back and makes them lose control for a longer period of time

perks.name: Concussive Force
perks.desc: Shield Bash deals 200% more Damage. Thunder Hammer Pommel Smash deals 100% more damage and deals area-of-effect Damage within a 7 meter radius. Cooldown is 5 seconds.

perks.name: Glory's Shield
perks.desc: All Squad Members within the banner's area of effect take 20% less Damage, and the banner lasts 20% longer

perks.name: Invigorating Icon
perks.desc: When the banner is activated, all Squad Members regain maximum Contested Health, but it recharges 50% slower

perks.name: Rejuvenating Effect
perks.desc: When the banner is activated, it revives Incapacitated Squad Members within its area of effect

perks.name: Merciless Resolve
perks.desc: After a Shield Bash or Thunder Hammer Pommel Smash, Melee Damage increases by 15%, you do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits and you cannot be knocked back for 10 seconds

perks.name: Inspiration
perks.desc: All Squad Members within the banner's area of effect deal 20% more Damage

perks.name: Emergency Countermeasure
perks.desc: When your Armour is depleted, a reserve Shock Grenade automatically detonated at your position. Cooldown is 90 seconds.

perks.name: Defensive Mastery
perks.desc: A perfectly timed Parry instantly Incapacitates a Majoris- or Extremis-level enemy. Cooldown is 90 seconds.

perks.name: Armoured Advance
perks.desc: If you have Armour remaining, you do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits and you cannot be knocked back

prestige.name: Auxiliary Reload
prestige.desc: Melee kills of Extremis-level or higher enemies restore your Primary Weapon's Ammo by 1 Magazine

prestige.name: Masterful Defence
prestige.desc: Ability Charge is restored by 1% for every blocked Ranged Attack

prestige.name: Standard Bearer
prestige.desc: When Chapter Banner activates, you become Invulnerable to Damage for 2 seconds

prestige.name: Emboldened Stand
prestige.desc: When the Chapter Banner is active, all Squad Members do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits and cannot be knocked back within its zone.
